text: Futhi baxoxele umlando ngamadodana ka-Adam amabili ngeqiniso ngesikhathi womabili enza umnikelo (kuMvelinqangi) wamukeleka koyedwa wabo, kepha awuzange wamukeleke komunye (lona owawungamukelekanga umnikelo wakhe) wathi “ngempela ngizokubulala (lowo owawamukelekile umnikelo wakhe) wathi, “ngempela uMvelinqangi wamukela kuphela (umnikelo) kulabo abalungileyo
